'''16w15b''' is the third and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9.3]], released on April 13, 2016,<ref name="blog_16w15a">{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160411155628/https://mojang.com/2016/04/minecraft-snapshot-16w15a/|title=Minecraft Snapshot 16w15a|website=Mojang.com}}</ref> which improves performance and fixed bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=16w15b|prefix=Minecraft
|;From released versions before 1.9.2
|17630|Zombie pathfinding to unreachable targets causes server lag.
|98994|Chunk generation performance regressed by 20-30%.
|100692|Collisions cause extreme lag.
|;From version 1.9.2
|100442|DEV - Navigation Listener very slow code.
|;previous
|100848|Glitch upon entering the edge of the world sitting on the boat/horse/minecart.
}}</onlyinclude>
